short_summary: SUPPORT SERVICES FOR THE MILITARY COMMAND SOFTWARE CENTRE_WRIGHT PATTERSON AFB
description: The Crown revises the Solicitation Period end date to February 14, 2023 at 14:00 EST
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Details

* **Tender Title**: Support Services for the Military Command Software Centre
* **Reference Number**: WS3831802535
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3831802535
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Publication Date**: 20 January 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: 14 February 2023, 2:00 PM EST (Completed)

## Corrected Tender Details

Note that the tender closing date had been revised to 14 February 2023 at 2:00 PM EST.

## Tender Information

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Limited Tendering Reason**: None

## Trade Agreements

This tender is open to trade arrangement in accordance with the following treaties:

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

## Delivery Region

The procurement is open to all suppliers located in Canada.

## Contracting Entity

The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), located in Gatineau, Quebec, Canada.

## Contact Information

For any inquiries regarding this tender, please contact Arden Aresta, SPAC/PSPC.

* Email: [arden.aresta@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:arden.aresta@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## URLs & Attachments

This announcement is available at the following URL: 
[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15188364?extsite=MTUxODgzNjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15188364?extsite=MTUxODgzNjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

No attachments are available for this tender.
